Headline: #95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95, and 112 buses temp. rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and Terminal; WB: 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following unauthorized person on the tracks. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Elevator at Chicago Temporarily Out-of-Service
ShortDescription: The Kimball- and Linden-bound platform elevator at Chicago (Brown, Purple Lines) is temporarily out-of-service. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
The Kimball- and Linden-bound platform elevator at Chicago (Brown, Purple Lines) is temporarily out-of-service.

Our crews are working to assess the repair time for this elevator—this alert will be updated with additional information if/when we can estimate its return to service.

Crews are working to return this elevator to service as quickly as possible.

Learn more about the work we do to maintain, repair and upgrade elevators.
